long.para: horzcat(x,y) horizontally concatenates two elements, x and y into an array. Normally this function is not used directly (it implements concatenation with [ and ]).

examples.precode:
>> clifford_signature(2,2) >> show(horzcat(e1,e2))
e1 *
1 0
+ e2 *
0 1
>> show([e1,e2])
e1 *
1 0
+ e2 *
0 1
